short_summary: Supply and delivery of western red cedar at Pacific Rim National Park Reserve
description: Rebuild of the Kwisitis Visitor Center Boardwalk
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

**Contract Title:** Supply and Delivery of Lumber for Pacific Rim National Park Reserve

**Reference Number:** WS4200719661-Doc4296722141

**Solicitation Number:** WS4200719661

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** November 7, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** December 1, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Amendment Date:** November 29, 2023

## Background

Parks Canada Agency, as the end-user entity, requires the supply and delivery of western red cedar lumber for a reconstruction project at the Kwisitis Visitor Center Boardwalk in the Pacific Rim National Park Reserve.

## Request for Proposal

This is a competitive tender where the lowest price will be the determining factor for awarding the contract.

## Delivery Location

The delivered materials are required for a construction project in the British Columbia region, specifically in the Pacific Rim area.

## Contract Details

* The contract is expected to begin on an unspecified date and end by March 31, 2024.
* The contractor should be prepared to supply a quantity of western red cedar lumber.
* The contract is for the supply and delivery of western red cedar to complete the infrastructure project.

## Tender Status

The tender is EXPIRED, and submissions are no longer being accepted.

## Key Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact for Clarification:** Kristina Mikulova (elle-la / she-her) at Kristina.Mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Document Atlas and Notice

For more information, please visit the Discovery Ariba webpage at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17942633?extsite=MTc5NDI2MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17942633?extsite=MTc5NDI2MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Attachments

 None.
